JobFullDesc: Every once in a while, a job comes along with an opportunity to be at the ground level of a fun, new project. If you have been waiting for that kind of opportunity this may be the job for you! We are looking for an innovative software data engineering architect who can work boundaryless across Microsoft to bootstrap a data pipeline for a new engaging, highly personalized user experience and make complex things simple for our customers. You will be responsible for delivering engaging experiences to billions of customers. Serving that many customers is a huge responsibility and a rare opportunity. Every single day you will get the chance to deploy code into hyperscale services that power experiences on billions of devices. You will also work with the latest cloud technologies and develop scalable Azure services using a mix of in-house and open-source technology. You will be using the latest advances in AI and ML to drive intelligence into these experiences to make them fun, personalized, and relevant.  We are a fun, startup-like, fast paced mentality team with not a lot of meetings or processes: we just like to get stuff done. Our motto is to work on interesting things and have fun doing it! You will work with smart people who care deeply about creating a fun and supportive workplace, and you will have an incredible opportunity to learn and grow. Best of all, your work will impact millions of people to achieve more, and you can be proud to see customers benefit from the work you do. This is a job with high executive visibility and opportunity for advancement. There are a lot of opportunities for cross group work as well as technical leadership. We are looking for someone who loves that kind of work and is proficient at creating and maintaining warm and productive working relationships. You will also need to be a go getter, a fast learner and be able to work with a lot of ambiguity. ResponsibilitiesYou will contribute to the work of a talented group that values diverse ideas, perspectives, andbackgrounds. Key skills include: Designing, constructing, testing, and maintaining a robust, reliable, and scalable data pipeline infrastructure. Automating sophisticated data science and machine learning algorithms. Enabling rapid experimentation of new product initiatives. Analytics for user behavior, including segmentation models and predicting trends (growth models). Collaboration and Communication: Be a great partner and communicator to foster great relationships with partners across the business, customers, and other stakeholders. Strategic Leadership and Judgement: Work with the leadership team to define the success metrics and drive data strategy initiatives and provide thought leadership. Microsoft Values and Culture Leadership:Be a keen representative of the Microsoft cultural attributes and leadership principles and have a positive impact on team morale and work climate. QualificationsRequired Qualifications: Bachelor’s or advanced degree in Computer Scienceor a relatedSTEMfield or equivalent industry experience At least 6 years ofindustryexperienceinsoftwareengineering;
